200169.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「流砂の海に 落:
They say if you fall into a sea of quicksand, you'll be swallowed deeper and deeper and never get out. Don't
push. Don't push!

200170.「砂嵐の夜には 防砂ダムよりデカい\n 謎の大巨人が現れるって ウワサだぜ。\n:
It is rumored that a mysterious giant, bigger than Sand Dam, appears on the night of a sandstorm. I'd like to see
it once.

200171.「ここは ドルワーム王国管轄の 防砂ダム。\n ゴブル砂漠の東と ダラズ採掘場の:
This is the Sand Dam under the jurisdiction of Dolworm Kingdom, which surrounds the sea of quicksand east of
the Goble Desert and west of the Daraz Quarry to prevent sand from flowing out. From here, we can see an eerie
cocoon in the quicksand sea. We will continue to monitor the site.

200172.「ご苦労様であります！\n ビャン殿より お話は聞いておりますよ。\n 流砂の遺:
Thank you very much for your efforts! I have heard from Lord Byan that you are going to Quicksand Ruins with us.
I heard that you are going with us to Quicksand Ruins. It is difficult to travel on foot or even on a dolboard
in this sea of quicksand. This is where this special boat comes in handy. It is called the Eternal
Gateria! Mr. Byan is making final adjustments, but as soon as he is finished, we will depart. Since these
ruins have never been explored before, there may be some danger.

200173.「ビャン殿が操縦される こちらの船で\n 流砂の遺跡へ 行くことができますよ。\:
This boat, piloted by Mr. Byan, will
take you to Quicksand Ruins. Would you
like to board now?<yesno><close>

200174.「あなたも お手伝いのため\n 流砂の遺跡へ 行ってくださるのですね。\n ささ:
You are going to Quicksand Ruins to
help us. Quickly. Please, go to the
ship!

200175.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「この防砂ダムは:
This Sand Dam was completed as far back as 3000 years ago. It is a legacy of the Urbea Underground City. I am
grateful to be able to use it, but I wonder why it was destroyed when they had the technology to build such a
thing.

200176.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「<pc>殿！:
! I am glad to hear that you are safe. After the great collapse of the ruins, Lord Byan had no choice
but to escape. He had always been concerned about his safety, but has stubbornly believed
that he would live. Although he has temporarily returned to Dolworm Kingdom to report the current
situation, we would like to let you know that you are safe!

200177.「流砂の海に 落ちると\n どんどん 深いところへ飲み込まれて\n 二度と 抜け:
They say that if you fall into the quicksand sea, you will be swallowed deeper and deeper and never get out
again. But I heard that some monsters can live in the sea of quicksand, and if you try hard enough, you may be
able to walk through it. No, no, I'm kidding. Don't push it. Don't push it!

200178.「ここらじゃ 砂嵐なんて そう珍しくないが\n 今回のは……なんだか 様子がおか:
Sandstorms are a rarity around here, but there's something strange about this one. Is the cocoon of the end
finally starting to move? Or is it the legendary Giant of the World coming out of nowhere?

200179.突然 <pc>の持っている\nリウ老師の探知機が 光を放った。\n<br>\nだ:
Suddenly <pc>'s Master Liu's
Locator lit up. Let's use the locator
from Key Items.

200182.「ご覧ください 流砂の向こうを……。\n 流砂の遺跡の辺りから\n 突如 異常な:
Look beyond the quicksand. Suddenly, a freak sandstorm erupted around Quicksand Ruins. The Dolworm Research
Institute reports that they have also observed a massive heat source reaction. What in the world is going
on?

200183.「今の光は いったい……？\n <pc>殿が お持ちになっている\n 何かが 反:
What was that light? It seemed to be a reaction to something that has in his possession.
Anyway, as for the unusual sandstorms that are visible beyond the quicksand, they show no sign of abating. The
Dolworm Research Institute has informed us that they have also observed a massive heat source
reaction. What in the world is going on?

200184.「<pc>殿！ \n 繭の下で 不吉な砂嵐が 起きています……。\n これは 何:
!There is an ominous sandstorm brewing under the cocoon. Could this be a sign of things to
come! Lord Byan says he feels something in his chest and is on his way here with reinforcements from
Dolworm Kingdom!

200185.「ビャン殿は 万が一の事態にそなえるため\n ドゥラ院長に頼み込んで ドルワーム:
I heard that Byang-dono has asked Director Dura to round up the artillery of the Dolworm Kingdom in
case of emergency. He's not just a man of action, is he? It's like he's the leader of some country.

200187.「流砂の底には 古代の遺物が まだまだ\n たくさん 眠ってるのかもしれねえなあ:
There may be a lot of ancient relics still sleeping at the bottom of the quicksand. Like that Urbea Colossus.
But don't push it. Don't push it!

200188.「ウルベア大魔神は 倒したはずなのに\n 未だに 砂嵐の夜には\n 謎の大巨人が:
The Urbea Colossus was supposed to be defeated, but rumor has it that a mysterious giant still appears on the
night of sandstorms. According to the Dolworm Research Institute, the residue of the Great Satan's earth
vein energy and the sandstorm combine to create a gigantic apparition, I don't know. Well, it's better to be
thrilled without any logic, isn't it? I'd like to see it once myself.

200189.「ここは ドルワーム王国管轄の 防砂ダム。\n ゴブル砂漠の東と ダラズ採掘場の:
This is the Sand Dam under the jurisdiction of Dolworm Kingdom. It surrounds the sea of quicksand to the
east of the Goble Desert and west of the Daraz Quarry, preventing the sand from flowing out. Although the cocoon
of demise has vanished and the Great Demon has been vanquished, the garrison is still engaged in garrison
duty to investigate the surrounding ruins.

200190.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「英雄殿 ご苦労:
Thank you for your hard work, Hero! It is thanks to you and Byan that I am still alive. It seems that Lord Byan
has left for another ruin at the request of Director Dura. I hope to see you again somewhere!

200191.「この防砂ダムは さかのぼること\n ３０００年前には 完成してたらしい。\n:
This Sand Dam was completed as far back as 3000 years ago. It is the legacy of Urbea Underground City.
Soldiers and cannons can ride on it and it won't break. Even if Urbea Colossus goes wild, Urbea Underground
City is unbreakable.

201343.昇降機を使って 防砂ダムの下に 降りますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to use elevator to go
down Sand Dam?<yesno><close>
